column3: X Time out: Time out: Physical Intervention: small child
column5: supine ran out of class to a calming room. She continually hit her head on the wall. Hit and kicked staff repeatedly
column6: was put into small child restraint. Let go when calmed. Started hitting her head on the wall again
column7: nurse was called & she was put in to small child restraint again. When calmed
column8: she was let out of restraint
column9: but immediately became physically aggressive; hitting
column11: biting staff. Took her shoe laces out of her shoes and wrapped them around her neck. Was put into supine until she calmed. Intervention: Physical Intervention (minutes)
